name: PayLocally
overview: PayLocally is an e-merchant payment solution, which provides online payment solutions to both online shoppers and e-merchants. PayLocally’s online payment solutions enable online shoppers to make payment without directly using debit or credit cards; also it enables online shoppers without credit cards to shop with cash. Some of the advantages to buyers are: It shields buyers from credit card fraud since it limits how often bank card information is shared online. Also, it enables cash payment option. One of the unique things about PayLocally is that it can be used all over the World as long as the user account is credited prior to shopping online. And multiple credit cards can be consolidated into a single PayLocally account.

milestones.description:
PayLocally, a Consolidated Online Payment Solution That Encompasses Cash and Virtual Credit Card Payment Options, Has Officially Launched:


Published by: San Francisco Chronicle
